item.title: Windows encoding error
item.description: Context I have a gradio app called text-generation-webui and user need to have python to start it. For normal people, they do not have python installed in their computer, so I need to package the python environment into the app. We use conda to manage the python environment and we use conda-pack to package the environment. I create a GUI using gooey to start python cli in a subprocess. The code is like this:
